name: part_000
file: tmp_【#博衣こより3D】歌います！踊ります！体を張ります！アイドルです！！！【ホロライブ】 [yOZxZy1HcJg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title card with background music.
Highlights montage of Hakui Koyori's previous activities and 3D preview clips.
Live performance of the song 'Luma' (ルマ).
Post-performance MC and official greetings for the 3D debut.

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: こんこよー！博衣こよりです！
subtitles.english: Konkoyo! I'm Hakui Koyori!

subtitles.original: はい！ハッシュタグ博衣こより3Dよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Yes! Please use the hashtag Hakui Koyori 3D!

subtitles.original: オッケー！こよは頭脳！頭脳派ですから！
subtitles.english: Okay! Koyo is a brain! I'm the intellectual type!

subtitles.original: はい、やったー！こよりスケッチ！
subtitles.english: Yes, did it! Koyori Sketch!

subtitles.original: いぇーい、はい！せーの！
subtitles.english: Yay, yes! One, two!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！研究室らしー全開！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Lab-style at full throttle!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！全開！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Full throttle!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！こよりの助手くん、わんわんわん！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Koyori's assistants, bow-wow-wow!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！ケモ耳！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Animal ears!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！しっぽぴこぴこ！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Tail twitching!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！頭脳派なんで！見守って！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! I'm the brainy type! Watch over me!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！可愛いですよ！いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! I'm cute! Yay!

subtitles.original: はい！はい！はい！はい！オッケー！博衣こよりです！
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! Yes! Yes! Okay! I'm Hakui Koyori!

subtitles.original: やったー！間に合ったー！
subtitles.english: Did it! I made it!

subtitles.original: マヨネーズは飲み物です！ちなみに、うどん好きです！
subtitles.english: Mayonnaise is a drink! By the way, I love udon!

subtitles.original: はい！全開！
subtitles.english: Yes! Full throttle!

subtitles.original: みんなー！今日は、待ちに待った
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for coming to my

subtitles.original: こよりの3Dお披露目配信に来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: long-awaited 3D debut stream today!

subtitles.original: 初見さんも関係なく楽しめるように
subtitles.english: I'll do my best so that even

subtitles.original: 頑張っていくので、最後まで楽しんでってね！
subtitles.english: first-timers can enjoy it, so please have fun!

subtitles.original: 満点な人生も
subtitles.english: A perfect life,

subtitles.original: 秀才な解答もございません
subtitles.english: Nor a brilliant answer, I have none.

subtitles.original: 有害な評論も
subtitles.english: Harmful reviews,

subtitles.original: 見え透いた同情も聞きたくはないな
subtitles.english: Nor transparent sympathy, I don't want to hear.

subtitles.original: 壮観な表彰も
subtitles.english: A spectacular award ceremony,

subtitles.original: 平凡な真っ当もございません
subtitles.english: Nor an ordinary decency, I have none.

subtitles.original: 暗澹な将来も
subtitles.english: A gloomy future,

subtitles.original: 傲慢な快晴も見たくはないな
subtitles.english: Nor an arrogant clear sky, I don't want to see.

subtitles.original: はいはい　俯いちゃって　ヤンヤンヤン　フラフラリ
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, head down, yan yan yan, swaying about.

subtitles.original: 彷徨って
subtitles.english: Wandering around.

subtitles.original: 正答　失っちゃって　わーんわーんわん　だって！
subtitles.english: Losing the answer, wah, wah, wah, because!

subtitles.original: 心は満たされない！
subtitles.english: My heart cannot be satisfied!

subtitles.original: 愛を頂戴　感情烈火メッタッタッタ　声枯らせ
subtitles.english: Give me love, a conflagration of emotions, scream it out.

subtitles.original: 全然わかんない
subtitles.english: I don't understand it at all.

subtitles.original: 罰点喰らい尽くせ　心臓血漿ダッタッタッタ　踊り舞え
subtitles.english: Devour the failing marks, heart plasma, dance away.

subtitles.original: 正解なんてバイバイ推奨
subtitles.english: I recommend saying goodbye to correct answers.

subtitles.original: だっだっだっだわーお！
subtitles.english: Da da da da, wow!

subtitles.original: 満点な答案も
subtitles.english: A perfect answer sheet,

subtitles.original: 優秀な成功もございません
subtitles.english: Nor a superior success, I have none.

subtitles.original: 後悔な人生も
subtitles.english: A life of regret,

subtitles.original: 停滞の殺到も見たくはないな
subtitles.english: Nor a rush of stagnation, I don't want to see.

subtitles.original: 毎回　躓いちゃって　キャンキャンキャン　フラフラリ
subtitles.english: Stumbling every time, kyan kyan kyan, swaying about.

subtitles.original: 孕んで
subtitles.english: Being filled with it.

subtitles.original: 正答　無くなっちゃって　わーんわーんわん　待って！
subtitles.english: Losing the answer, wah, wah, wah, wait!

subtitles.original: 出口も見当たらない？
subtitles.english: I can't even find the exit?

subtitles.original: 愛を頂戴　感情熱唱メッタッタッタ　声枯らせ
subtitles.english: Give me love, singing with emotion, scream it out.

subtitles.original: 燦然止まんない
subtitles.english: This brilliance won't stop.

subtitles.original: 罰点笑い倒せ　心臓真っ赤カッタッタッタ　踊り舞え
subtitles.english: Laugh off the failing marks, heart red, dance away.

subtitles.original: 正解なんて無い無い提唱
subtitles.english: I advocate that there are no correct answers.

subtitles.original: だっだっだっだわーお！
subtitles.english: Da da da da, wow!

subtitles.original: 愛を頂戴　感情裂傷メッタッタッタ　歌唄え
subtitles.english: Give me love, a laceration of emotions, sing a song.

subtitles.original: 全然染まんない
subtitles.english: I won't be tainted at all.

subtitles.original: 喝采撃ち通せ　心境烈火カッタッタッタ　這い上がれ
subtitles.english: Shoot through the applause, a fiery mind, crawl up.

subtitles.original: 正解なんて曖昧実証
subtitles.english: A vague demonstration of what is correct.

subtitles.original: 愛を頂戴　感情烈火メッタッタッタ　声枯らせ
subtitles.english: Give me love, a conflagration of emotions, scream it out.

subtitles.original: 全然わかんない
subtitles.english: I don't understand it at all.

subtitles.original: 罰点喰らい尽くせ　心臓血漿ダッタッタッタ　踊り舞え
subtitles.english: Devour the failing marks, heart plasma, dance away.

subtitles.original: 正解なんてバイバイ推奨
subtitles.english: I recommend saying goodbye to correct answers.

subtitles.original: 正解なんて無い無い提唱
subtitles.english: I advocate that there are no correct answers.

subtitles.original: だっだっだっだわーお！
subtitles.english: Da da da da, wow!

subtitles.original: はーい！みんなー！
subtitles.english: Hi! Everyone!

subtitles.original: こんこよー！見えてますかー！
subtitles.english: Konkoyo! Can you see me?

subtitles.original: ホロライブ6期生、秘密結社holoXの頭脳、
subtitles.english: I'm Hakui Koyori, the brain of Secret Society holoX,

subtitles.original: 博衣こよりだよー！
subtitles.english: Hololive 6th Gen!

subtitles.original: ということで、博衣こよりの3Dお披露目配信、はじまるよー！
subtitles.english: And so, Hakui Koyori's 3D debut stream is starting!
